short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily Access Office Tools Right from Your Browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ultimate Office tools are an ideal collection of tools that enables end-users to access and open documents right from the browser. This kit features access to Google Translate, Sheets, Docs, Slides, Forms and Keep, in addition to a search bar for easy web browsing online. With this package, users can run everyday tasks conveniently at the comfort of their homes.

How to get started

Ultimate Office tools is a browser extension which is integrated into Chrome for reliable results. Users are required to securely sign into their Google accounts to access the extension. 
The search engine on the new tab will change to Bing.com once downloaded.

Features

The program comes with features that include;
• Easier and fast access to programs such as  Google Translate, Sheets, Docs, Slides, Forms and Keep
• Fast and reliable web search powered by Bing.com
• Exclusive view time

Permissions
The extension requires your permission to access the office tools.
It also requires this permission to allow new tabs display the Ultimate Office tools extension with the features including the background image, time and customised search.
The extension will override the new tab page in order to display all the Google office tools. 
Ultimate Office Tools does not save or share any user data or credentials. We do NOT ask or save your login and password details.

Uninstallation
To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate  "Ultimate Office tools", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Remove  Ultimate Office tools?", click the Remove button.

Conclusion

Ultimate Office tools offer users the ultimate opportunity to complete tasks from their favorite browsers. The package has a storage size of 2MB where the customer support offers help in the English language.  

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Ultimate Office tools" extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Please refer to our Privacy Policy (https://mediastinct.com/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://mediastinct.com/terms-conditions/)

Disclaimer: Ultimate Office Tools is not a part of any of the applications or tools added in this extension including Google Translate, Sheets, Docs, Slides, Forms and Keep. It is an unofficial app (browser add-on) not linked to Google.com and an independent project and functions only as a toolbar extension that has been created to ensure that office tool services can be accessed and used at ease. Please, refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on the purpose and methods of our handling user data. 
Note: Once the extension is downloaded, the new tab search box will be replaced by a search bar powered by Bing.com (Microsoft), please refer to Microsoft's  Privacy and Cookie policy here - https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement
